example.name: autogen1
example.text: The received Darwinian wisdom of the day said that animals living so long ago must be simple in design , limited in scope and ancestral to contemporary species .
example.arg: that animals living so long ago must be simple in design , limited in scope and ancestral to contemporary species

example.name: autogen2
example.text: the wisdom of letting the free markets operate
example.arg: of letting the free markets operate
